name: Faces (MathusalemRex)
description:
You wake to find yourself in a dimly lit room. As is customary for this type of predicament, you have no memory of what led you here. Perhaps if you could find someone, they may be able to shed some light on the situation.

Faces is a mystery adventure in which you must find a way out, avoiding the perils that would have you stay forever!

WASD-CURSER-CONTROLLER to move.

Keyboard "E" "SPACE" / Controller X or Trigger to Activate.
